t: What are some healthy and natural brands of dog food available on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer: Look for foods that have protein (and where the protein’s from) as the top ingredient. Stay away from foods that have grains in them. Make sure you read the label before buying and the freshness dates as well. Stay away from Kibbles n Bits, Purina and others like these brands.

t: How to buy the best dog food on Amazon - Quora
s: Answer: Check with your local grocery store or pet store. Amazon doesn’t necessarily have the best prices. Many pet store have a "buy 10, get one free" kibble program. Do your homework. Go on FLIPP and compare prices. Check flyers and ads. A bit of homework can save you money.
